title: Pset_DistributionPortTypePipe
description: Pipe port occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcDistributionPort.

ConnectionType.title: ConnectionType
ConnectionType.description:
The end-style treatment of the pipe port:

BRAZED: Brazed. 
COMPRESSION: Compression. 
FLANGED: Flanged. 
GROOVED: Grooved. 
OUTSIDESLEEVE: Outside Sleeve. 
SOLDERED: Soldered. 
SWEDGE: Swedge. 
THREADED: Threaded. 
WELDED: Welded. 
OTHER: Another type of end-style has been applied.
NONE: No end-style has been applied.
USERDEFINED: User-defined port connection type. 
NOTDEFINED: Undefined port connection type.

ConnectionSubType.title: ConnectionSubType
ConnectionSubType.description: The physical port connection subtype that further qualifies the ConnectionType.

NominalDiameter.title: NominalDiameter
NominalDiameter.description: The nominal diameter of the pipe connection.

InnerDiameter.title: InnerDiameter
InnerDiameter.description: The actual inner diameter of the pipe.

OuterDiameter.title: OuterDiameter
OuterDiameter.description: The actual outer diameter of the pipe.

VolumetricFlowRate.title: VolumetricFlowRate
VolumetricFlowRate.description: The volumetric flow rate of the fluid.

MassFlowRate.title: MassFlowRate
MassFlowRate.description: The mass flow rate of the fluid.

FlowCondition.title: FlowCondition
FlowCondition.description: Defines the flow condition as a percentage of the cross-sectional area.
